text: (Aur woh un logon ke liye bhi hai) jo un logon ke baad aaye hain, jo kehte hain ke “Aey hamare Rubb, humein aur hamare un sab bhaiyon ko baksh de jo humse pehle iman laye hain aur hamare dilon mein ehle iman ke liye koi bugz (rancour) na rakh. Aey hamare Rubb, tu bada meharbaan aur raheem hai”
